kpiExports.name: cropTrinityActivity

meta.expressionLhs: RANGE_APPEND ( CASE WHEN ISNULL ( ( COALESCE ( CALC_CROP_TO_NULL ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Approve Credit Check' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Deny Credit Check' ] , "_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" ) , CALC_CROP_TO_NULL ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Deny Credit Check' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Cancel Order' ] , "_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" ) ) ) ) = 0 THEN ROUND_MONTH ( "_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" ) END , '1M' ) AS "Month" FORMAT "%Y-%m"

components.title: Distribution by Month
components.$errorMessage: KPI with name "cropActivity" could not be found.

axis0.text:
RANGE_APPEND(
  CASE 
    WHEN ISNULL(KPI(cropTrinityActivity,<%=cropFromActivity%>,<%=cropViaActivity%>,<%=cropToActivity%>)) = 0 
      THEN HOURS(_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES.EVENTTIME) 
  END,
  1,
  0,
  23
)
axis0.name: Hour

meta.expressionLhs: RANGE_APPEND ( CASE WHEN ISNULL ( ( COALESCE ( CALC_CROP_TO_NULL ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Approve Credit Check' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Deny Credit Check' ] , "_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" ) , CALC_CROP_TO_NULL ( FIRST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Deny Credit Check' ] TO LAST_OCCURRENCE [ 'Cancel Order' ] , "_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES"."ACTIVITY_EN" ) ) ) ) = 0 THEN HOURS ( "_CEL_O2C_ACTIVITIES"."EVENTTIME" ) END , 1 , 0 , 23 ) AS "Hour"

components.title: Distribution by Hour
